Name: [Deployed] Paperboo
Desc: Active Skill: Uses a cardboard box to camouflage itself, inducing a taunt effect: While camouflaged, being attacked by enemies or reaching the camouflage time limit will trigger an explosion, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> in an area.
Desc2: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack: Enters a cardboard box and jumps at the target enemy, causing an explosion when it lands, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> over a large area.</color>
